Question: This was this person's first foray into reality television.
Hints: In April 2005, this person starred in a new Fox sitcom Stacked as Skyler Dayton, a party girl who goes to work at a bookstore.
In February 2006, this person decided to boycott the Kentucky Derby because of its support for Kentucky Fried Chicken.
In early 2004, this person returned to the spotlight.
